mentionedBy.name: Varonis Systems Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Platform includes foundational data discovery combining data classification and cataloging for finding personal, sensitive and high value data. Automates scans, discovery, classification, and workflows across unstructured and structured data, on-prem and cloud. Uses advanced machine learning and data intelligence to help enterprises better manage and protect data.
